string.value: After carefully observing Omega Sector, I should start up a conversation with Jr. Officer Medin.
Scadur offered to take me back to Lith Harbor. Once I get there, I better get back to Olaf...
I met up with Olaf again. What's this creepy scroll for...?
Alright, how was Omega Sector? Did you like it there? Well, you seem to have traveled and observed a whole bunch of diverse towns here. Are you ready to go back to Lith Harbor now?
Alright, I'll take you back to Lith Harbor.
Once you return to Lith Harbor, talk to #eOlaf#n and he may give you something very interesting.
You must have some unfinished business to take care of here. Let me know when you're ready to leave this place.
Oh, that was fast. How was it? Did you get to realize just how huge this world really is? Alright, here'a small gift for you.
